The first of these strips of glittering cloth was worn by a monk from Jinin who would interweave it into his handwraps of mighty blows. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 38.

  • Armor You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against illusions and Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}.
  • Weapon(visual) After you cast an illusion spell by activating the scarf, the weapon is shrouded in a mesmerizing illusory pattern. Your next Strike causes the target to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute if it hits. If you don't make a Strike by the end of your next turn, the illusion ends with no effect.
